クラス
ow.id.IDLittleEndian の使用

IDLittleEndian を使用しているパッケージ
ow.id   
 

ow.id での IDLittleEndian の使用
 

IDLittleEndian を返す ow.id のメソッド
 IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.clearBit(int n)
          Returns an IDLittleEndian whose value is equivalent to this ID with the designated bit cleared.
 IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.copy(int newSize)
           
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getHashcodeBasedID(java.lang.Object obj, int sizeInByte)
          Returns a newly generated ID based on the hashcode of the specified object.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getID(java.math.BigInteger id, int size)
          Return a new ID instance with the value specified by the given BigInteger.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getID(byte[] id, int size)
          Return a new ID instance with the value specified by the given byte array.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getID(java.lang.String hexString, int size)
          Return a new ID instance with the value given as a String.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getRandomID(int size)
          Return a new ID having random value.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getSHA1BasedID(byte[] bytes)
          Returns a newly generated ID with a hashed value of the specified byte array.
static IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.getSHA1BasedID(byte[] message, int sizeInByte)
          Returns a newly generated ID with a hashed value of the specified byte array.
 IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.setBit(int n)
          Returns an IDLittleEndian whose value is equivalent to this ID with the designated bit set.
 IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.shiftLeft(int n)
          Returns an IDLittleEndian whose value is (this << n).
 IDLittleEndian IDLittleEndian.shiftRight(int n)
          Returns an IDLittleEndian whose value is (this >> n).
 

IDLittleEndian 型のパラメータを持つ ow.id のメソッド
static int IDLittleEndian.matchLengthFromMSB(IDLittleEndian a, IDLittleEndian b)
